lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Peladeau said Quebecor may also consider trading in its listing on the American stock exchange for a New York Stock Exchange listing.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said Maxwell's sons, who are French citizens, would provide an entree into the French market, where foreigners are prevented from buying newspapers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Peladeau, who together with family members owns about 55 pct of Quebecor, said he has recieved offers from the heads of two major Canadian companies who are interested in the project but has not decided whether he would take partners in the newspaper venture.
